item.title: Blockchain Solutions in Healthcare
item.description: While the principles of blockchain were first used in the world of finance as the technology that permitted Bitcoin to function, it has applications for many other industries, including healthcare. With blockchain there’s no one central administrator; however, it comes with exceptional security advantages since records are distributed across a network of repeated databases, which are always synchronized. Users are only able to update the block they have access to, and such updates become repeated across the network.
